verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What's on Your heart, Lord?
What's on Your heart?
Where would You
establish Your throne
And make Your
Righteousness known?
What must be taken away
That You may have a clear way?
What's on Your heart, Lord
What's on Your heart?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Search out our hearts, Lord.
Search out our hearts.
There may You
establish Your throne
And make Your
Righteousness known.
What must be taken away
Take, so You have a clear way.
Search out our hearts, Lord.
Search out our hearts.
